Changelog
=========

0.1.3 (2013-01-25)

- Refactored parsing to use native pip config parser, so now it's possible to nest configs via -r just like using pip


0.1.2 (2013-01-05)
------------------

- Added filling versions part with parsed versions


0.1.1 (2012-12-22)
------------------

- Improved version parsing


0.1.0 (2012-12-22)
------------------

- First release.
